location: 3818 E Cesar E Chavez Ave., Los Angeles, CA 90063.
description: Located at the former location of Self Help Graphics and dedicated to the memory of Dr. Otto E. Sperling and Yolanda Garcia Rubio. This mural is reconstruction of David Alfaro Siqueiros' "América Tropical," which he painted in Olvera Street in 1932. Photo © Robin Dunitz.
